mapper.select: SELECT C.COUPON_NAME, C.COUPON_CODE, C.DISCOUNT_PRICE, C.COUPON_START_DATE, C.COUPON_END_DATE, O.COMMON_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mem_coupon M INNER JOIN COUPON_INFO C ON C.COUPON_CODE = M.COUPON_CODE WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND TO_CHAR(C.COUPON_END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') + 1 > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') OR C.COUPON_END_DATE IS NULL ) AS "UNUSED_COUNT" FROM MEM_COUPON M INNER JOIN COUPON_INFO C ON C.COUPON_CODE = M.COUPON_CODE INNER JOIN COMMON O ON M.COUPON_STATUS = O.COMMON_CODE WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND O.COMMON_CODE = 'CPU01' AND TO_CHAR(C.COUPON_END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') + 1 > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') OR C.COUPON_END_DATE IS NULL
